snippet.title: FuzzBall Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Releases on all consoles August 20!

"When Plush Comes to Shove"

FuzzBall is a party game where you play cute plush dolls that come to life, roll into balls and knock each other away from the play field.

Get your hands on FuzzBall here:
Nintendo Switch - https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/FuzzBall-1828391.html
PS4 - https://store.playstation.com/en-il/product/EP5672-CUSA18530_00-FUZZBALLMASTER01
Xbox One - https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/fuzzball/9n9z4ggbn0zc/0010?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

Follow us on social media for game release updates and more!
